017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.factory;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.lang.System.getProperty;
022import static javax.script.ScriptEngine.ENGINE;
023import static javax.script.ScriptEngine.ENGINE_VERSION;
024import static javax.script.ScriptEngine.LANGUAGE;
025import static javax.script.ScriptEngine.LANGUAGE_VERSION;
026import static javax.script.ScriptEngine.NAME;
027import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.NULL_STRING;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_JAVA_VERSION;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_JVM_VERSION;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmpty;
034
035import javax.script.ScriptEngine;
036import javax.script.ScriptEngineFactory;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.StringJoiner;
039import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
040
041import org.apiguardian.api.API;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.internal.JavaEngineImpl;
044
045/**
046 *  This is script engine factory for the Foundation &quot;Java&quot; script
047 *  engine.
048 *
049 *  @author A. Sundararajan
050 *  @modified    Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
051 *  @version $Id: JavaEngineFactory.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $
052 *  @since 0.0.5
053 *
054 *  @UMLGraph.link
055 */
056@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: JavaEngineFactory.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $" )
057@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
058public class JavaEngineFactory implements ScriptEngineFactory
059{
060        /*-----------*\
061    ====** Constants **========================================================
062        \*-----------*/
063    /**
064     *  The name of the script engine for the Java language: {@value}.
065     */
066    public static final String ENGINE_NAME = "Foundation Java";
067
068    /**
069     *  The extension for source files for this script engine: {@value}.
070     */
071    public static final String EXTENSION = "java";
072
073    /**
074     *  The name of the language that is supported by this script engine:
075     *  {@value}.
076     */
077    public static final String LANGUAGE_NAME = "Java";
078
079        /*------------*\
080    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
081        \*------------*/
082    /**
083     *  The internal class counter.
084     *
085     *  @see #getClassName()
086     *  @see #getNextClassNumber()
087     */
088    private static final AtomicLong m_NextClassNumber = new AtomicLong( 0L );
089
090        /*------------------------*\
091    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
092        \*------------------------*/
093    /**
094     *  The supported extensions of the script files for this engine.
095     */
096    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticCollection" )
097    private static final List<String> m_Extensions;
098
099    /**
100     *  The mime types of script file that are recognised by this engine.
101     */
102    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticCollection" )
103    private static final List<String> m_MimeTypes;
104
105    /**
106     *  The names of the supported languages.
107     */
108    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticCollection" )
109    private static final List<String> m_Names;
110
111    static
112    {
113        m_Names = List.of( ENGINE_NAME, LANGUAGE_NAME );
114        m_Extensions = List.of( EXTENSION );
115        m_MimeTypes = List.of( "text/x-java-source", "text/java", "text/x-java", "application/ms-java" );
116    }
117
118        /*--------------*\
119    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
120        \*--------------*/
121    /**
122     *  Creates a new instance of {@code JavaEngineFactory}.
123     */
124    public JavaEngineFactory() {}
125
126        /*---------*\
127    ====** Methods **==========================================================
128        \*---------*/
129    /**
130     *  Generates a unique class name; used by
131     *  {@link #getProgram(String...)}.
132     *
133     *  @return The new class name.
134     */
135    private static String getClassName()
136    {
137        final var retValue = "org_tquadrat_foundation_scripting_java_Main$%1$d".formatted( getNextClassNumber() );
138
139        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
140        return retValue;
141    }   //  getClassName()
142
143    /**
144     *  {@inheritDoc}
145     *
146     *  @return Always {@value #ENGINE_NAME}.
147     *
148     *  @see #ENGINE_NAME
149     */
150    @Override
151    public final String getEngineName() { return ENGINE_NAME; }
152
153    /**
154     *  {@inheritDoc}
155     */
156    @Override
157    public final String getEngineVersion() { return getProperty( PROPERTY_JVM_VERSION ); }
158
159    /**
160     *  {@inheritDoc}
161     */
162    @SuppressWarnings( "AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableType" )
163    @Override
164    public final List<String> getExtensions() { return m_Extensions; }
165
166    /**
167     *  {@inheritDoc}
168     *
169     *  @return Always {@value #LANGUAGE_NAME};
170     */
171    @Override
172    public final String getLanguageName() { return LANGUAGE_NAME; }
173
174    /**
175     *  {@inheritDoc}
176     */
177    @Override
178    public final String getLanguageVersion() { return getProperty( PROPERTY_JAVA_VERSION ); }
179
180    /**
181     *  {@inheritDoc}
182     */
183    @Override
184    public final String getMethodCallSyntax( final String objectName, final String methodName, final String... args )
185    {
186        final var retValue = new StringBuilder( requireNonNullArgument( objectName, "objectName" ) )
187            .append( "." )
188            .append( requireNonNullArgument( methodName, "methodName" ) )
189            .append( "(" );
190        if( nonNull( args ) && (args.length > 0) )
191        {
192            final var joiner = new StringJoiner( ", ", " ", " " );
193            for( final var arg : args ) joiner.add( arg );
194            retValue.append( joiner.toString() );
195        }
196        retValue.append( ")" );
197
198        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
199        return retValue.toString();
200    }   //  getMethodCallSyntax()
201
202    /**
203     *  {@inheritDoc}
204     */
205    @SuppressWarnings( "AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableType" )
206    @Override
207    public final List<String> getMimeTypes() { return m_MimeTypes; }
208
209    /**
210     *  {@inheritDoc}
211     */
212    @SuppressWarnings( "AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableType" )
213    @Override
214    public final List<String> getNames() { return m_Names; }
215
216    /**
217     *  Determines the next class number.
218     *
219     *  @return The next class number.
220     */
221    private static long getNextClassNumber() { return m_NextClassNumber.getAndIncrement(); }
222
223    /**
224     *  {@inheritDoc}
225     */
226    @Override
227    public final String getOutputStatement( final String toDisplay )
228    {
229        final var argument = format( "\"%s\"", nonNull( toDisplay ) ? toDisplay : NULL_STRING );
230        final var retValue = getMethodCallSyntax( "System.out", "print", argument );
231
232        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
233        return retValue;
234    }   //  getOutputStatement()
235
236    /**
237     *  {@inheritDoc}
238     */
239    @Override
240    public final String getParameter( final String key )
241    {
242        final var retValue = switch( key )
243        {
244            case ENGINE -> getEngineName();
245            case ENGINE_VERSION -> getEngineVersion();
246            case NAME, LANGUAGE -> getLanguageName();
247            case LANGUAGE_VERSION -> getLanguageVersion();
248            case "THREADING" -> "MULTITHREADED";
249            default -> null;
250        };
251
252        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
253        return retValue;
254    }   //  getParameter()
255
256    /**
257     *  {@inheritDoc}
258     */
259    @Override
260    public final String getProgram( final String... statements )
261    {
262        /*
263         * We generate a Main class with main method that contains all the
264         * given statements.
265         */
266        final var retValue = new StringBuilder();
267        retValue.append( "class " )
268            .append( getClassName() )
269            .append(
270                """
271
272                {
273                    public static void main( String... args )
274                    {
275                """ );
276        if( nonNull( statements ) )
277        {
278            for( final var statement : statements )
279            {
280                if( isNotEmpty( statement ) )
281                {
282                    retValue.append( "        " ).append( statement );
283                    if( !statement.endsWith( ";" ) )
284                    {
285                        retValue.append( ";");
286                    }
287                }
288                retValue.append( "\n" );
289            }
290        }
291        retValue.append(
292            """
293                }
294            }""" );
295
296        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
297        return retValue.toString();
298    }   //  getProgram()
299
300    /**
301     *  {@inheritDoc}
302     */
303    @Override
304    public final ScriptEngine getScriptEngine()
305    {
306        final var retValue = new JavaEngineImpl( this );
307
308        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
309        return retValue;
310    }   //  getScriptEngine()
311}
312//  class JavaEngineFactory
313
314/*
315 *  End of File
316 */
